mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(productno), 0) + 1 as productno FROM product), #{productcateno}, #{membersno}, #{name}, #{price}, #{content}, #{recom}, #{cnt}, #{replycnt}, sysdate, #{word})
mapper.select: SELECT productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product WHERE productcateno=#{productcateno} ORDER BY productno DESC

SELECT i.fname, i.fupname, i.thumb, p.productno, p.productcateno, p.name, p.price, p.content, p.recom, p.cnt, p.replycnt, p.rdate, p.word FROM product_image i, product p WHERE (i.productno= p.productno) AND p.productno=#{productno} ORDER BY productno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM product
SELECT productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product WHERE productno=#{productno}

SELECT productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word FROM product
WHERE productcateno=#{productcateno}
WHERE productcateno=#{productcateno} AND word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY productno DESC

SELECT fname, fupname, thumb, productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word, r FROM( SELECT fname, fupname, thumb, productno, productcateno, membersno, name, price, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, word, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT i.fname, i.fupname, i.thumb, p.productno, p.productcateno, p.membersno, p.name, p.price, p.content, p.recom, p.cnt, p.replycnt, p.rdate, word FROM product_image i FULL OUTER JOIN product p
ON i.productno= p.productno
ON i.productno= p.productno WHERE word LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY productno DESC ) ) where r > = #{startNum} and r < = #{endNum}
